verbs.description: your hair [V: can] sabotage your success at work professional women are expected to wear their hair straight and smooth but that expectation has a lot to do with stereotypes around gender and race fortunately there some evidence that these unspoken hairstyle rules are changing perception institute founder instyle organization by design executive university of colorado denver founder and president hair sauder school of business university of colorado denver business school mary lou andre personality and individual differences associate professor new york times reporter business insider traci sitzmann university of texas npr larry ellison mary angela bock consultant professor facial hair university of british columbia austin texas oracle austin
